block.p: SONIC AUTOMOTIVE INC., Charlotte, N.C., the second-largest publicly held auto dealer, said it was in talks to acquire dealerships with combined annual revenue of $500 million by the end of the year.

FACTSET RESEARCH SYSTEMS INC., Greenwich, Conn., a provider of financial data to investment banks and fund managers, agreed to buy Innovative Systems Techniques Inc. for an undisclosed amount of cash.
